name: Athar: The Massively Multiplayer Real-Life Experience
blurb: A gaming experience unlike any other, that combines the best elements of modern gaming with advanced laser tag equipment

rewards.reward:
FAN
==============================

Our heartfelt thanks. You're helping us realize our dream. Your name (or a name of your choosing) and a short phrase will be listed in a special section of our website.

HELPER
==============================
Includes: FAN reward
==============================
Have your name (or a name of your choosing) written on a thank you card that is included with every retail box we ship.

ELITE MEMBER ==============================
Includes: HELPER reward
==============================
Get access to the fishbowl stream to interact with us while we make your new favorite game. Also, reserve your username, which will appear to others differently, indicating your Elite Member status.
ATH\u00c1R BASIC ============================== Includes:  ELITE MEMBER reward ==============================\r\nJoin the fight. Get a AA battery-powered ATD as soon as they're ready to go.

ATH\u00c1R PRO ============================== Includes: ELITE MEMBER reward ==============================\r\nRule the battlefield. Get a Lithium-ion rechargeable ATD that features a USB port to charge your phone while you play. Don't let dead batteries take you out of the game.

ATH\u00c1R PRO PLUS ============================== Includes: ATH\u00c1R PRO reward ==============================\r\nStand out from the rest. Get a collector's edition ATD that is a different color than the normal model. You also get 1 full year of DOUBLE XP, and your username will be marked as a Pro Plus member.

ATH\u00c1R FLAG BEARER ============================== Includes: ELITE MEMBER reward ==============================\r\nJoin the closed beta. When it's ready, we'll send you two beta versions of the ATD for you and a friend. Keep them, or trade them in (you pay shipping) for Ath\u00e1r Basic models when the game is ready to ship. DOUBLE XP for 1 year is included on your primary user name.

REPRESENTATIVE ============================== Includes:  ATH\u00c1R PRO PLUS reward ============================== \r\nEverything from the Pro Plus package, plus an epic t-shirt that we'll ship out within just a couple months that you can wear while waiting for your ATD to arrive.

BRONZE OUROBOROS ============================== Includes: ATH\u00c1R FLAG BEARER  reward ============================== \r\nBeta admission for two, plus have a name or idea of yours be woven into the fiction in a unique way. Want to be an artifact? Want to be a quest? This is your chance. We'll do our best to accommodate your request. Also, both usernames get DOUBLE XP for 1 year, and both will be marked as Bronze Ouroboros backers.

GENERAL ============================== Includes: REPRESENTATIVE reward ==============================\r\nGet the Representative tier reward, and also have a name or idea of yours be woven into the fiction in a unique way. Want to be an artifact? Want to be a quest? This is your chance. We'll do our best to accommodate your request.

SILVER OUROBOROS ============================== Includes: ATH\u00c1R FLAG BEARER reward ==============================\r\nJust like the Flag Bearer tier, except when you trade in your units, you get Ath\u00e1r Pro models back instead of Ath\u00e1r Basic (you pay shipping.) Also both user accounts get DOUBLE XP for 1 year, and both are marked as Silver Ouroboros backers.

FIELD MARSHAL ============================== Includes: REPRESENTATIVE reward ==============================\r\nA double-helping of the Representative tier. You get two limited edition lithium-ion powered ATDs, two t-shirts, and two accounts with 1 year of DOUBLE XP. Both accounts will be marked as Field Marshal backers so everyone will admire you.

GOLD OUROBOROS ============================== Includes: SILVER OUROBOROS reward ==============================\r\nDidn't get in early enough to get into the beta on the other tiers? This option is for you. Get the whole Silver Ouroboros tier reward, plus receive standing VIP admission to all livestream events (airfare not included)
